OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive temsirolimus IV 30 minute day 1 , 8,15 , 22 oral pazopanib hydrochloride daily day 4-28 course 1 day 1-28 subsequent course . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Blood sample obtain periodically evaluation pharmacokinetics temsirolimus pazopanib , plasma serum angiogenic cachectic factor ( e.g. , VEGF , bFGF , PlGF SDF-1 ) enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay , biological marker mTOR/PI3/Akt , Ras/MAPK , VEGFR , PDGFR , HIF-1 pathway .
